txt.en:
'Ah, so Siliveth sends you to check on us?

'So she does care after all.

'We are doing quite well actually. We've set up camp and are currently waiting for our companion to fix their waggon before progressing on our journey to Iaphel.

'Actually, there is something with which we could use assistance, if you are able?'

'Good traveller. I hope I find you well.

'I am looking for someone to check on my travelling companions. With all of the commotion here in Barad Faen, and the animals in the area becoming more agitated, we had to find intermediate shelter. Barad Faen lacks the necessities we need.

'Could you find Luingil in Echad Lendir and lend your aid to our travels?'
Siliveth has asked you to check on their companion Luingil.\n\nLuingil can be found in Echad Lendir.
Talk to Luingil in Echad Lendir
Siliveth would like you to check on her friends who are sequestered in Echad Lendir.\n\nEchad Lendir can be found to the west of Barad Faen.
